misc-misleading-bidirectional.description:
Description

Warns about unterminated bidirectional unicode sequence, detecting potential attack
as described in the
Trojan Source
attack.

Example:

#include
<iostream>
int
main
()
{
bool
isAdmin
=
false
;
/*‮ } ⁦if (isAdmin)⁩ ⁦ begin admins only */
std
::
cout
<<
"You are an admin.
\n
"
;
/* end admins only ‮ { ⁦*/
return
0
;
}
misc-misleading-bidirectional.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
